name: Mouse Hunter
description:
Mouse Hunter - a puzzle game with a top view, executed in 2D graphics, where you have to catch the mouse.
The essence of the game is simple - you need to prevent the mouse from reaching the cheese by placing mousetraps, but in reality this task is not an easy one. The course of the game: a mouse appears on the map with a heap of cheese and one by one you place a mousetrap that should prevent it, and it takes a step, including diagonally. Victory is awarded if the mouse is trapped or surrounded by them without the possibility of a move.
Complete all 100 levels and catch annoying thief mice!
